result.eng: Now that the summer has started, we can go on holidays.
result.ga: Anois agus an samhradh tosaithe is féidir linn dul ar saoire
result.orig: Anois agus an samhradh tosaithe is féidir linn dul ar saoire
result.html: Anois agus an samhradh tosaithe is féidir linn dul ar saoireNow that the summer has started, we can go on holidays.
result.ponchtml: Anois agus an saṁraḋ tosaiṫe is féidir linn dul ar saoireNow that the summer has started, we can go on holidays.

result.html: Bíonn siad anseo gach samhradhThey are here every summer.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn siad anseo gaċ saṁraḋThey are here every summer.

result.ga: Chaith muid an samhradh le chéile
result.orig: Chaith muid an samhradh le chéile
result.html: Chaith muid an samhradh le chéileWe spent the summer together.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ muid an saṁraḋ le ċéileWe spent the summer together.

result.eng: We will be swimming in the sea this summer.
result.ga: Beidh muid ag snámh sa bhfarraige an samhradh seo
result.orig: Beidh muid ag snámh sa bhfarraige an samhradh seo
result.html: Beidh muid ag snámh sa bhfarraige an samhradh seoWe will be swimming in the sea this summer.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ muid ag snáṁ sa ḃfarraige an saṁraḋ seoWe will be swimming in the sea this summer.

result.eng: I'd love to go to France this summer.
result.ga: Ba bhreá liom dul go dtí an Fhrainc an samhradh seo
result.orig: Ba bhreá liom dul go dtí an Fhrainc an samhradh seo
result.html: Ba bhreá liom dul go dtí an Fhrainc an samhradh seoI'd love to go to France this summer.
result.ponchtml: Ba ḃreá liom dul go dtí an Ḟrainc an saṁraḋ seoI'd love to go to France this summer.

result.eng: Well, in the summer I go to football matches.
result.ga: Bhuel sa samhradh téim chuig na cluichí peile
result.orig: Bhuel sa samhradh téim chuig na cluichí peile
result.html: Bhuel sa samhradh téim chuig na cluichí peileWell, in the summer I go to football matches.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuel sa saṁraḋ téim ċuig na cluiċí peileWell, in the summer I go to football matches.

result.eng: I play tennis in the summer.
result.html: Imrím leadóg sa samhradhI play tennis in the summer.
result.ponchtml: Imrím leadóg sa saṁraḋI play tennis in the summer.
